name: the GENERAL GENERAL: a convenience store RPG
name_original: the GENERAL GENERAL: a convenience store RPG
description:
Hey there kiddo! 

When your items are running low,
and you're looking for groceries on the go.
When you want that happy face,
that's not some tin-sync in a metal case,
come to the General General!

For that retro customer service style,
with employees who always smile,
for military efficiency in every aisle, 
come to the General General! 

For tomato soup, tomato pies, tomato corn,
and all your tomato supplies,
come to the General General!

Now opening in a trans-dimensional location near you!

Real Human employees wanted! 

Disclaimer:

The following Demo is a single playable day with the opportunity to get to know some characters, explore the first level and experience the world of the General General! 

This demo should be played as 'proof of concept' for people to test out and provide constructive feedback.  

If there is a lot of interest in this project, I hope to turn this proof of concept into a full game in the coming months, with a 30 day experience, more NPCs, different districts, romance options and multiple endings. With your support and encouragement, I can create a full and engrossing General General experience. 

If you are interested in supporting this project, please consider donating to my ko-fi or joining me on Twitch to watch as I build the game, and it's characters.

To provide feedback and recommendations on this demo, please email me at whitevaultstudio@gmail.com

This demo will be updated every two weeks, with your feedback, recommendations and debug updates. 

Thank you once more and enjoy the General General Demo!

_______________

This is a solo game development project. 

All character design, art, levels, development and writing is done by WhiteVault 

Follow WhiteVault on Twitch to keep updated on The General General and all my current projects.

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/whitevault

ko-fi - https://ko-fi.com/whitevault
